mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( name, email, password, cell_phone, login_type, is_enabled, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{cellPhone}, #{loginType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{isEnabled}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, email, name, cell_phone, is_enabled, created_at, updated_at, login_type FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT user_id, name, email, cell_phone, is_enabled, created_at, updated_at, login_type FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
